TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConvertible

summary.span: 定义将实现引用或值类型的值转换为具有等效值的公共语言运行时类型的方法。

span.span: Defines methods that convert the value of the implementing reference or value type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口提供一些方法，用于将实现类型的实例的值转换为具有等效值的公共语言运行时类型。This interface provides methods to convert the value of an instance of an implementing type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value. 公共语言运行时类型为 、、、 、 、 、 、、、、、、、和。The common language runtime types are , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 如果没有有意义的转换为公共语言运行时类型，则将引发特定的接口方法实现 。If there is no meaningful conversion to a common language runtime type, then a particular interface method implementation throws . 例如，如果此接口是在布尔类型上实现的，则方法的实现将 引发异常，因为没有任何有意义 的等效于布尔类型。For example, if this interface is implemented on a Boolean type, the implementation of the method throws an exception because there is no meaningful equivalent to a Boolean type. 公共语言运行时通常 通过类公开接口 。The common language runtime typically exposes the interface through the class. 公共语言运行时还会 在显式接口实现中的内部使用接口，以简化用于支持类中的转换的代码 和基本的公共语言运行时类型。The common language runtime also uses the interface internally, in explicit interface implementations, to simplify the code used to support conversions in the class and basic common language runtime types. 除了 接口外，.NET Framework 还提供类，用于将用户定义数据类型转换为其他数据类型。In addition to the interface, the .NET Framework provides classes called type converters for converting user-defined data types to other data types. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [通用化类型转换](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada) 主题。For more information, see the [Generalized Type Conversion](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada) topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 针对复数类的实现，它使它能够首先转换为， 然后调用该的静态 成员 。The following code sample demonstrates an implementation of for a Complex number class, allowing it to be cast first as a and then calling the static members on that . [!code-cpp[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/CPP/iconvertible.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/CS/iconvertible.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/VB/iconvertible.vb#1)]

para.span: 如果实现 接口， 如果 参数是实现类型的实例，并且 参数是公共语言运行时类型，则方法会自动调用实现。

span.span: If you implement the interface, your implementation will be called automatically by the method if the parameter is an instance of your implementing type and the parameter is a common language runtime type.

para.span: 大多数转换方法具有类型为的参数 ，该参数表示当前区域性 () 或特定区域性。

span.span: Most conversion methods have a parameter of type that represents either the current culture () or a specific culture.

para.span: 大多数情况下， 基类型的实现会忽略此参数。

span.span: For the most part, the implementations of the base types ignore this parameter.

para.span: 但是，你可以选择是否在代码中使用它。

span.span: However, you can choose whether to use it in your code.
Type Conversion in the .NET Framework

span.span: Returns the for this instance.

returns.span: 枚举常数，它是实现该接口的类或值类型的 。

span.span: The enumerated constant that is the of the class or value type that implements this interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ToBoolean(class System.IFormatProvider provider) cil managed
Public Function ToBoolean (provider As IFormatProvider) As Boolean

param.name: provider
param.span: 接口实现，提供区域性特定的格式设置信息。

span.span: An interface implementation that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的区域性特定格式设置信息将此实例的值转换为等效的 Boolean 值。

span.span: Converts the value of this instance to an equivalent Boolean value using the specified culture-specific formatting information.

returns.span: 与此实例的值等效的 Boolean 值。

span.span: A Boolean value equivalent to the value of this instance.
